ingredients.ingredient: 8 jumbo shrimp, peeled and deveined with tails left on
4 strips thin sliced bacon, cut in half

cookingTips: Pat shrimp dry and season before wrapping to ensure bacon adheres properly
Leave tails on shrimp for easier handling and presentation
Air fry at 375°F for 6-8 minutes until bacon is crispy and shrimp are pink and cooked through
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide me through seasoning shrimp, wrapping them with bacon pieces, and air frying until the bacon is crispy and shrimp are perfectly cooked.
